finds.description:
ğŸ **Beeper Pulse is live!**

I've set up automated monitoring for the Beeper ecosystem:

ğŸ“Š **Status Page:** https://beeper-community.github.io/beeper-pulse
ğŸ“¦ **GitHub:** https://github.com/beeper-community/beeper-pulse

For automated alerts about releases and status changes, join: **#beeper-pulse-alerts:beeper.com**

Features:
- Release tracking for Beeper Desktop, SDK, and bridges
- Status monitoring with uptime tracking
- RSS/JSON feeds for updates
